sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container, Row, Col, Form, ListGroup} from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from '../assets/data/tours' import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRating' const Tourdetails = () => { const {id} = useParams() const tour= tourData.find(tour =>tour.id==id) const {photo, title,place, desc, price,address, reviews, city, distance, maxGroupSize}= tour const {totalRating, avgRating}= calculateAvgRating(reviews) return (

{title}

{address} {calculateAvgRating ==0? null: avgRating} {totalRating==0? 'No Ratings' :({reviews?.length}) }
{place} {price} {maxGroupSize}
) } export default Tourdetails
